item.title: A $151B Pentagon SHIELD Contract Has Put This Smallcap Satellite Stock Back On Traders’ Radar
item.description: The award enables Spire to compete for future task orders supporting next-generation U.S. missile defense initiatives.

item.title: Why Did Morgan Stanley Downgrade PayPal?
item.description: Morgan Stanley downgraded PayPal to ‘Underweight’ on Thursday, flagging execution challenges, slowing dollar growth, and limited Venmo monetization as...

item.title: Why Did Shake Shack Stock Rise In Premarket Today?
item.description: After months of underperformance, SHAK stock is seeing a change in tone among Wall Street analysts.

item.title: DJT To Merge With TAE Technologies In $6B Deal, Targeting First Utility-Scale Fusion Plant In 2026
item.description: The newly combined company has announced plans to secure a site and begin construction of its first utility-scale fusion plant in 2026.
